forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
